name: src/Path.js
Path
description: Class to manage URL paths

name: append
description: Append to a path

name: delete
description: Delete end of path

name: get
description: Get the path

name: parse
description: Parse the path part of a URl

name: replace
description: Replace part of a path

name: toString
description: Get string representatio of the path or the uri

params.name: uri
params.description: if true return string represention of uri

name: src/Query.js
Query
description: Class to manage query part of URL

name: add
description: Add a query string

name: clear
description: Remove the query string

name: get
description: Get the query string

name: merge
description: Merge with the query string - replaces query string values if they exist

name: set
description: Set with the query string - replaces existing query string

name: setUrlTemplateQuery
description: Set the url template query string vale

name: toString
description: Get string representatio of the path or the uri

params.name: uri
params.description: if true return string represention of uri

name: src/StringBuilder.js
StringBuilder
description: Class to make it easier to build strings

name: toString
description: Return full string

name: append
description: Append a string to an existing string

name: insert
description: Insert a string to an existing string

params.name: pos
params.description: position at which to insert value

name: src/TinyUri.js
TinyUri
description: Uri - manipulate URLs

name: src/encode.js
content:
export const base64Decode = typeof window !== 'undefined' ? window.atob : (data) => Buffer.from(data, 'base64').toString('ascii');
export const base65Encode = typeof window !== 'undefined' ? window.btoa : (data) => Buffer.from(data, 'ascii').toString('base64');

name: ./README.md

content:
{
  "name": "tiny-uri",
  "version": "8.1.0",
  "description": "Lightweight Javascript library for handling URLs",
  "keywords": [
    "Lightweight",
    "Javascript",
    "library",
    "es2015",
    "URLs"
  ],
  "repository": "https://github.com/robhicks/tiny-uri.git",
  "browser": "src/TinyUri.js",
  "main": "dist/tiny-uri.cjs.js",
  "module": "src/TinyUri.js",
  "scripts": {
    "build": "npx rollup -c",
    "docs": "npx esdoc -c .esdoc.json",
    "mocha": "mocha -u bdd -R spec -t 5000 --watch test/tests.js",
    "prepublish": "npx rollup -c && npx esdoc -c .esdoc.json",
    "start": "rollup -cw",
    "test": "mocha -u bdd -R spec -t 5000 test/tests.js"
  },
  "author": "rob@hixfamily.org",
  "license": "MIT",
  "devDependencies": {
    "chai": "^4.3.4",
    "esdoc": "^1.1.0",
    "esdoc-standard-plugin": "^1.0.0",
    "eslint": "^7.24.0",
    "mocha": "^8.3.2",
    "nock": "^13.0.11",
    "npm-run-all": "^4.1.5",
    "reify": "^0.20.12",
    "rollup": "^2.45.2",
    "rollup-plugin-buble": "^0.19.8",
    "rollup-plugin-json": "^4.0.0",
    "rollup-plugin-live-server": "^2.0.0",
    "rollup-plugin-node-resolve": "^5.2.0",
    "rollup-plugin-terser": "^7.0.2",
    "serialize-javascript": ">=5.0.1",
    "sinon": "^10.0.0",
    "sinon-chai": "^3.6.0",
    "static-server": "^2.2.1"
  },
  "dependencies": {}
}
name: package.json
